Name: Roar Of Time
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Must Recharge. Lethal. Unique. If successful, the target can't take any actions unless they spend 1 Will point per action attempted. Duration 1 Round.
Description: Through a terrifying roar, Dialga bounds the forces of time on a single area, the unfortunate target will be trapped in a time warp, growing old in a matter of seconds.
